Sentencas: The kinetics of catalytic steam reforming of methane over an Ni-YSZ anode of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) have been investigated with the cell placed in a stack configuration.
Titulo: Methane Steam Reforming over an Ni-YSZ Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode in Stack Configuration

Sentencas: In order to decrease the degree of conversion, a single cell stack with reduced area was used.
Titulo: Methane Steam Reforming over an Ni-YSZ Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode in Stack Configuration

Sentencas: Measurements were performed in the temperature range 600-800 degrees C and the partial pressures of all reactants and products were varied.
Titulo: Methane Steam Reforming over an Ni-YSZ Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode in Stack Configuration

Sentencas: The obtained rates could be well fitted with a power law expression (r proportional to P-CH4(0.7)).
Titulo: Methane Steam Reforming over an Ni-YSZ Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode in Stack Configuration

Sentencas: A simple model is presented which is capable of predicting the methane conversion in a stack configuration from intrinsic kinetics of the anode support material.
Titulo: Methane Steam Reforming over an Ni-YSZ Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode in Stack Configuration

Sentencas: The predictions are compared with the stack measurements presented here, and good agreement is observed.
Titulo: Methane Steam Reforming over an Ni-YSZ Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode in Stack Configuration
